questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face a challenge against a Warlord of the Sea known for his ability to turn people into toys. What is...?
Set on an island dominated by a tyrannical Warlord, this arc introduces the character Law and features the Straw Hats battling against Caesar Clown. What is...?
Set on a frozen island, this arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates and the G-5 marines against a former Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This ability, used by a Straw Hat crew member, allows them to turn their body parts into weapons. What is...?
This latest transformation of Luffy, revealed in the Wano arc, shows a significant boost in his powers and abilities. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows for the creation and manipulation of soap and bubbles. What is...?
This character, a member of the Worst Generation, possesses the ability to create a 'Room' and manipulate objects and people within it. Who is...?
This vice admiral of the Marines is known for his loud voice and the power of the Barrier-Barrier Fruit. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a skilled cook and martial artist, known for his kicks and dream of finding the All Blue. Who is...?
